meta.title: PolyHermes - Polymarket Copy Trading System
meta.description: PolyHermes - A powerful Polymarket prediction market copy trading system
meta.keywords: Polymarket, copy trading, prediction market, automated trading

hero.title: PolyHermes
hero.description: A powerful Polymarket prediction market copy trading system, supporting automated copy trading, multi-account management, real-time order push, and statistical analysis.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Complete Polymarket copy trading solution, from account management to order execution, all in one

accountManagement.title: Account Management
accountManagement.description: Multi-account support, import multiple wallet accounts via private keys, unified management. Private keys and API credentials are encrypted and stored securely.

leaderManagement.title: Leader Management
leaderManagement.description: Add wallet addresses of copy trading targets (Leaders), support filtering by category (sports/crypto), view trading history and statistics.

template.title: Copy Trading Template
template.description: Create copy trading templates, configure copy trading parameters. Support proportional and fixed amount copy trading, configure risk control parameters.

config.title: Copy Trading Config
config.description: Associate accounts, templates, and Leaders to create copy trading relationships. Real-time monitoring of Leader trades, automatically copying orders.

orderManagement.title: Order Management
orderManagement.description: View detailed information of all buy, sell, and matched orders, support filtering by account, Leader, time range, and other conditions.

positionManagement.title: Position Management
positionManagement.description: View and manage positions of all accounts in real-time, real-time position changes via WebSocket, support market and limit price selling.

statistics.title: Statistical Analysis
statistics.description: View global statistics, Leader statistics, category statistics, and copy trading relationship statistics, support filtering by time range.

systemManagement.title: System Management
systemManagement.description: Configure HTTP proxy through Web UI, real-time monitoring of API health status, manage users and view system announcements.

systemUpdate.title: System Update
systemUpdate.description: Support online system updates, no need to restart Docker container to complete updates. Automatic backup and rollback to ensure system stability.

backtest.title: Copy Trading Backtest
backtest.description: Backtest analysis of Leader's historical trades, simulate copy trading performance. Configure different parameters to evaluate strategy effectiveness and optimize configurations.

cryptoTailStrategy.title: Crypto Tail Strategy
cryptoTailStrategy.description: Tail-session auto strategy for crypto minute markets: set time window and spread conditions, trigger orders via order book WebSocket, fixed price 0.99, auto spread and settlement PnL stats.

tech.title: Tech Stack
tech.subtitle: Modern technology stack ensures high performance, security, and maintainability

screenshots.title: Screenshots
screenshots.subtitle: Perfect support for desktop and mobile, providing a consistent user experience

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.subtitle: One-click deployment with Docker, get started in minutes
quickstart.description: Copy and run this command to deploy PolyHermes automatically. The script will guide you through interactive configuration.

footer.description: A powerful Polymarket prediction market copy trading system
footer.disclaimer: This software is for learning and research purposes only. Users bear all risks when using this software for trading.
